title: Designing Learning Networks and Reward Systems to Activate Online Learning Communities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with online learning tools and understanding of social interaction
context.additional_context: Need to foster collaboration and sustained participation among learners in social-sector communities of practice aimed at enhancing workplace competencies

learning_goals: Learners perform peer knowledge-sharing activities at least three times on mobile platforms within one week.
Learners maintain community engagement motivation by earning at least five virtual badges through a reward system.
Learners submit collaborative social problem-solving solutions through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
